data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_79224d297f14377ad2eda8543432330d.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Chip starts eating potato chips once every 2s when out of combat, regenerating HP equal to 300 plus 45% of lost HP after finishing a whole bag (requires 4 bites). After eating a bag of chips, Chip will be full and cannot eat again for 5s. (The bite count will be saved if he enters combat before finishing a whole bag.)

Chip rams his hovercraft into the ground, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 100 plus 4% of target's Max HP and applying <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font> on enemy heroes hit. Chip gains a 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield upon hitting an enemy hero, which increases by 40% for each additional enemy hero hit. Chip's next Basic Attack will become ranged and also hit all nearby enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font>, detonating the mark to deal 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and stun each target for 0.6s.

Chip rushes for 2s, gaining up to 65% extra Movement Speed, after which he maintains the max speed for 2s.

Chip's next Basic Attack will cause him to charge at the enemy, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and knocking them back slightly.

Chip drops the <font color="a6aafb">Main Portal</font> on an enemy hero, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and briefly slowing them by 25%. The Main Portal deals 2 times the damage and immobilizes them for 1s after a delay. Meanwhile, he creates <font color="a6aafb">Connecting Portals</font> near allied heroes (10 units away) and behind the allied Base. The <font color="a6aafb">Main Portal</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Connecting Portals</font> last up to 15s.
<font color="a6aafb">Connecting Portal</font>: Heroes (on both teams) can teleport from <font color="a6aafb">Connecting Portals</font> to the <font color="a6aafb">Main Portal</font>, and allied heroes gain Burst Movement Speed for 1.5s and a 500 shield.
<font color="a6aafb">Main Portal</font>: The Main Portal inherits 70% of Chip's attributes. Heroes can stand on the <font color="a6aafb">Main Portal</font> for 2s to return to the <font color="a6aafb">Connecting Portal</font> they came from. Casting skills or launching Basic Attacks will reset the stand time.

Chip has 4 fixed <font color="a6aafb">Beacons</font> on the map when the battle starts. Chip can stand on a <font color="a6aafb">Beacon</font> to enable this skill and then use it to teleport to any other <font color="a6aafb">Beacon</font>. (This skill cannot be used in combat.)

data.name: Chip

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: High mobility with a focus on team benefits.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
equiplist.equipskill2: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill6: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Conceal: <font color="ffe63c">Blessing:</font> Continue to gain Gold (limit: 1500) through Roaming Equipment to keep enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Conceal</font>(current: <font color="ffe63c"> (+1 Roaming Gold)</font>)!
Active: Nearby allied heroes enter Camouflage State and their Movement Speed increases by <font color="ffe63c"> (+0.04 Roaming Gold)</font>% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage ends this state.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: MOMOI
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A carefree, genetically enhanced fox that wields advanced portal technology.

assist.desc: Chip's Ultimate allows his team to group up from anywhere, so he works well with heroes who can't cross the map quickly but excel in teamfights, such as Alpha, Hanabi, and Kadita.

strong.desc: Chip possesses strong initiation and CC abilities, making him a great counter against heroes with low mobility or those who are relatively squishy, such as Vexana, Layla, and Ixia.

weak.desc: Since enemies can also use Chip's Connecting Portals, certain heroes with strong teamfighting abilities, like Barats and Tigreal, can use them to their advantage.
